                       PiikInvalidParameters

        Parameters:
        newUser - User to be inserted into the database
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - User already exists or it has invalid parameters such as null values or non unique values on primary keys

      • createPost

        public Post createPost(Post post,
                       User currentUser)
                throws PiikDatabaseException,
                       PiikInvalidParameters
        Inserts a new Post into the database
        Parameters:
        post - New Post
        currentUser - Current user using the application
        Returns:
        post containing the given data and its generated ID
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Duplicated keys and null values that shouldn't be
        PiikInvalidParameters - Given post or currentUser are invalid

      • replyTicket

        public void replyTicket(Ticket ticket,
                        Message message,
                        User currentUser)
                 throws PiikDatabaseException,
                        PiikInvalidParameters
        An user replies a ticket by creating a message that will be associated to it; therefore, message.getTicket() cannot be null
        Parameters:
        ticket - the ticket is not necessary actually, we just have to check if the ticket is in the message
        message - reply to be added to the ticket
        currentUser - current user logged into the app
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException
        PiikInvalidParameters

      • modifyMessage

        public void modifyMessage(Message newMessage,
                          User currentUser)
                   throws PiikDatabaseException,
                          PiikInvalidParameters
        This function replaces the content of a message stored in the database because the user wants to modify it or because an admin wants to censor its content
        Parameters:
        newMessage - message to be updated
        currentUser - logged User
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException - Thrown if null is encountered in currentUser, oldMessage, newMessage
        PiikInvalidParameters
